oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Municipal Auditorium Under Construction, 1961
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Municipal Auditorium under construction. This facility, located at 417 4th Avenue North, was designed by Marr and Holman architects and opened in October of 1962. The structure has three levels with a seat capacity of approximately 10,000 people. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority, 8 November 1961. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
